channel.title: Python on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Dheepak's blog

item.title: Talk Python To Me
item.description: This is the 1stever podcast that I started with. I’m listening to the show regularly since 2017, yet I couldn’t recall how I got introduced to this show. According to the talkpython.fm, Talk Python to Me is a weekly podcast hosted by Michael Kennedy. The show covers a wide array of Python topics as well as many related topics (e.g. MongoDB, AngularJS, DevOps). Michael Kennedy hosts this show and he conducts trainings as well.

item.title: Black - Python
item.description: The common problem while using Black in VS Code for Python formatting, can be overcome by following below steps. Enable format on save Search for python formatting provider and select black Source: medium.com

item.title: PyConIndia 2019
item.description: My primary source of Python and Python related news was/is Python podcast, since 2016. In 2018, I came to know about Pycon taking place in Cleveland, OH. Dan Bader’s vlog on PyCon ‘18 was another pull factor towards the PyCon. Due to the ticket pricing I couldn’t make it to it. In H2 of 2018, I returned to India, and was looking forward to attend PyConIndia, which should be affordable.
